movies.title: Airplane!
movies.summary: This spoof comedy takes shots at the slew of disaster movies that were released in the 70s.

movies.title: Shaun of the Dead
movies.summary: Follow the bloody adventures of underachiever Shaun and his best mate Ed as they cope with a zombie invasion.

movies.title: Superbad
movies.summary: The inseparable best friends navigate the last weeks of high school and are invited to a gigantic house party.

movies.title: Dumb and Dumber
movies.summary: Best friends stumble across a suitcase full of money left behing in their care by Mary who was on her way to the airport
